scripts.start: concurrently -i -c "red,blue" "cross-env PORT=3001 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/mdbsync1 node index.js" "cross-env PORT=3002 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/mdbsync2 node index.js"
scripts.dev: concurrently -i -c "red,blue" "cross-env PORT=3001 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/mdbsync1 nodemon index.js" "cross-env PORT=3002 MONGODB_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017/mdbsync2 nodemon index.js"
